Prop Shafts 06

CENTER BEARING ASSEMBLY, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A06-160 Models, ALL 0.9
With Bolted Yoke A06-161 Models, ALL 1.3

DISABLE VEHICLE TOW-IN, Allowance

Includes:
1. Towing of vehicle from dealership's yard to service bay

Notes:
1. Copy of disabled vehicle to dealership towing bill must be on file and made available upon request

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Hydraulic Brake Vehicles A06-230 Models, ALL 0.3 |
Air Brake Vehicles A06-3230 Models, ALL 0.4 |

DRIVELINE ANGLES, Inspect

Includes:
1. Measure and record angles (use form CTS-1022) on prop shafts and power train components

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Single Drive Axles A06-190 Models, ALL 0.7
Tandem Drive Axles A06-191 Models, ALL 0.9
Each Additional Shaft A06-192 Models, ALL 0.3

PROP SHAFT, Balance

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Each A06-210 Models, ALL 0.8

PROP SHAFT (FRONT DRIVE AXLE), Install

Notes:
1. Additional allowance at Pre-Delivery Inspection for dealer installed driveline

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Front Drive Axle A06-240 Models, ALL 0.5

PROP SHAFT (REAR AXLE), Install

Notes:
1. This operations is to install the rear section of a multi-piece prop shaft or install single piece prop shaft if vehicle was towed in with prop shaft removed
2. This operation only applies to vehicles with towing coverage under the base warranty or service contract
3. Copy of disabled vehicle to dealership towing bill must be on file and made available upon request

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Medium Duty Multi-Piece Prop Shaft A06-3340 Models, ALL 0.2 |
All Other Prop Shaft Configuratioins A06-3341 Models, ALL 0.3 |

PROP SHAFT ASSEMBLY WITH SLIP YOKE AND CENTER BEARING, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Front Shaft A06-110 Other Models 1.7
Rear Shaft A06-111 Other Models 0.9
Each Additional Shaft A06-112 Other Models 0.8
Two Piece Shaft A06-113 CF 500/600 0.7
Three Piece Shaft A06-114 CF 500/600 1.0

PROP SHAFT ASSEMBLY WITH SLIP YOKE WITHOUT CENTER BEARING, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A06-100 Other Models 0.8
A06-101 CF 500/600 0.6

PROP SHAFT RUNOUT, Inspect

Includes:
1. Measure and record tube, yoke and flange runout

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Shaft A06-200 Models, ALL 0.5
Each Additional Shaft A06-201 Models, ALL 0.3

PROP SHAFT SAFETY LOOP, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A06-220 Models, ALL 0.5

PROP SHAFT STUB END, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and reinstall prop shaft, cutting, welding and balance assembly

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A06-180 Models, ALL 1.6

PROP SHAFT TUBING, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and reinstall prop shaft, cutting, welding and balance assembly

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A06-170 Models, ALL 2.2

STUB SHAFT ASSEMBLY WITH CENTER BEARING, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A06-120 Models, ALL 0.6

STUB SHAFT ASSEMBLY WITHOUT CENTER BEARING, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
With Slip Yoke A06-130 Models, ALL 0.8
With Bolted Yoke A06-131 Models, ALL 1.2

UNIVERSAL JOINT (ONE), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A06-140 Models, ALL 1.0

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A06-T1 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A06-T2 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A06-T3 Models, ALL 0.0
